INTELLIJ IDEA Community Edition 11.1.2

The annotations.jar is available in the redist folder of the IntelliJ IDEA distribution. This distribution is available under both Ultimate (paid) and Community (free) licenses and this apache licensed component is present in both. CA Owns Ultimate Licenses.
